author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate the manifest constants for request attributes created in the
RequestDispatcher implementation into the global constants file.
Correct the punctuation of the request attributes for cipher suite and key
size, per Section 4.7 of Servlet 2.3 PFD.

author: pierred
msg: Support for new JSP1.2 feature (new in PFD)
- Inspects the document for 'pageEncoding' and 'contentType' page
attributes to set the proper encoding of the page
- Added 'pageEncoding' as valid attribute for the page directive
- New error messages for page encoding

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix a bug where only the first 512 bytes of a POST request's data content

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a commented-out invocation of the request dumper filter, which is
quite useful for debugging.  All you need to do is remove the comments
around the <filter-mapping> element to enable this filter.
